mdx.body:
I'm a professional software developer working mostly with .NET technologies.

---

![Lucas](./lucas.jpg)

---

In my spare time I like to

- get scratched to bits by my lovely cats
- develop software, like Micser
- watch twitch streams, movies and TV series
- play PC games (i.e. mod Skyrim and try to find the cause for a crash for 4 hours)
- listen to or create music \m/
- plan on creating a game
- decide it would be more awesome to write my own game engine
- go back to Unity for the 8th time

---

Visit my...

1. [GitHub](https://github.com/loreggia)
1. [SoundCloud](https://soundcloud.com/loreggia)
